translation.en: - There's something dangerous
about the boredom of teenage girls.
Coach said that once.
translation.fr: C'est ce que disait ma coach.

translation.en: But she said it not like a mom
or a teacher or a guidance counselor.
translation.fr:
comme une prof
ou une conseillère d'orientation.

translation.en: She said it like she knew
and understood.
Coach saw something in us--
translation.fr: Elle a vu quelque chose en nous.

translation.en: something quivering and real.
She saw past the glitter and the hair and the attitude...
translation.fr:
Elle a vu au-delà des paillettes,
des coiffures, de l'insolence…

translation.en: To everything beneath. All our miseries.
translation.fr: Elle a su déceler nos souffrances.

translation.en: Most of all,
she could see that we were waiting...
Had always been waiting...
for her.
It was fucking beautiful.
Until it went too far.
- You like the ones with the tapered tip, right, babe?
translation.fr: Tu veux ceux au bout pointu ?

translation.en: - Yeah.
♪ I can make you all remember me ♪
♪ Little baby me ♪
- If you all got some game on, your star QB wouldn't be shipping off to basic.
translation.fr:
C'est dommage que votre quarterback
vous lâche pour les Marines.

translation.en: - The recruiters don't lie. It's one way out of Sutton Grove.
translation.fr:
Le recruteur a raison.
C'est l'occasion de se barrer d'ici.

translation.en: - Yeah, and come back in a body bag.
- Sounds like Sarge Will's been giving you the full-on hustle, huh?
translation.fr:
Le sergent Will va finir
par tous vous convaincre.

translation.en: - He's not a bad dude.
- How hard do you think it would be?
Sarge Will?
You're not climbing that tree.
translation.fr: Tu n'es pas à la hauteur.

translation.en: - Wanna make it interesting?
- No chance. - [laughs]
- I gotta keep my money.
You pulling a shift tonight, Slocum?
translation.fr: Tu es de service, ce soir, Slocum ?

translation.en: - Gotta fill that cup. You?
- Blow it off.
Come on. We'll practice.
- Yeah, you said that all summer, Captain, and we never did.
translation.fr:
Tu as dit ça tout l'été, capitaine.
On n'a rien fait.

translation.en: - Well, go on. Show 'em the back tuck.
- Nice! - [laughs]
[applause] - Thank you.
- You're getting better.
Who the fuck cares?
- Does it look like I care?
I just don't wanna flame out before regionals.
translation.fr: Je fais gaffe avant les régionales.

translation.en: That's all. - What? And the new coach is gonna get us there?
translation.fr: La coach va nous y faire monter ?

translation.en: Colette French?
Sounds like a porn star.
translation.fr: C'est un nom de star porno.

translation.en: Classy one, though. She won't do anal.
Some fancy new coach from across the state thinks she can come and run my squad?
translation.fr:
C'est pas parce qu'elle est célèbre
qu'elle a tous les droits !

translation.en: And as if she's hot. She's ancient.
translation.fr:
Elle est peut-être sexy,
mais elle est vieille.

translation.en: She's, like, 28.
I would like to see some 28-year-old ass do this.
translation.fr:
J'aimerais bien voir
une vieille de 28 ans faire ça.

translation.en: Come on.
Come on. [rock music]
You ready?
- Up. Up!
- Move!
You can bend those knees for ballers.
translation.fr:
Vous faites moins les difficiles
pour plier les genoux avec les mecs.

translation.en: You can bend them for me.
translation.fr:
Vous faites moins les difficiles
pour plier les genoux avec les mecs. Où est passé ton thigh gap, Hanlon ?

translation.en: Never gonna keep your thigh gap like that, Hanlon.
translation.fr: Où est passé ton thigh gap, Hanlon ?

translation.en: Again, bitches.
Move it.
Go! Move!
- I think that's her.
Coming in like an OG.
I better tell Cap'n Beth.
Kicks.
V-sits.
Plank.
That's enough. Line up.
First game is next Friday.
What do I see?
Spray tans.
Gummy-bear thighs.
Backyard tumblers.
But I don't see a squad.
And I do not see my top girl.
translation.fr: Et je ne vois pas de voltigeuse.

translation.en: - Beth's top girl. She's always-- - On my squads, you earn your spot.
translation.fr:
- Beth est notre voltigeuse…
- C'est un poste qui se mérite.

translation.en: You get strong. You rise.
translation.fr: On n'obtient que ce qu'on mérite.

translation.en: That's how you get to regionals, become champions,
translation.fr:
C'est en travaillant
que vous irez au championnat.

translation.en: get more for yourselves than Big Gulps and ballers.
translation.fr:
Finie, l'époque où vous vous empiffriez
et où vous fricotiez dans les toilettes.

translation.en: - We graduated past ballers in the eighth grade.
translation.fr: On a arrêté de faire ça dès la quatrième.

translation.en: - No phones on my squad.
Tomorrow, come in a bra that fits.
translation.fr: Trouve un soutien-gorge à ta taille.

translation.en: - [gasps] - Fix this.
translation.fr: Je ne veux plus voir ça.

translation.en: We don't do this.
- Hey, do you have deodorant?
- I really like her hair. It's like Cinderella.
translation.fr: J'adore ses cheveux. On dirait Cendrillon.

translation.en: - You heard Coach. Harness those babies.
translation.fr: Tu vas devoir ranger tes melons.

translation.en: - Hey, my mom said I should be proud of my body.
translation.fr: Il faut être fier de son corps.

translation.en: - RiRi, catch.
- [laughs] That's gonna be stuck in my head all day. - Yeah.
translation.fr:
- Je vais y penser toute la journée.
- À plus !

translation.en: - Man, she's so great. - Yeah.
- What are you up to tomorrow? - I don't know.
translation.fr:
- Tu fais quoi, demain ?
- Je ne sais pas.

translation.en: - Hey, fetus!
- I'll see you. - Okay.
- Didn't you hear about Coach French's last squad? Her top girl?
translation.fr:
Tu es au courant pour la voltigeuse
de l'ancienne équipe de French ?

translation.en: - Yeah. Girl took a header. Scalped her ponytail clean off.
translation.fr:
Elle s'est fait arracher
la queue de cheval en tombant.

translation.en: - Mm. - Dad said you made that up.
translation.fr: Papa dit que tu l'as inventé.

translation.en: - You better watch it, or...
- Ow! Stop!
Dad!
- Your chariot, fair daughter.
Can I offer two lovely ladies a ride?
- All right. You good?
- Bert's ride is so "Real Housewives."
translation.fr: La caisse de Bert est tellement ringarde.

translation.en: - Here's a thought:
blunts, Mom's Patrón, Lanvers Peak.
translation.fr:
Un pétard plus la tequila de ma mère,
à Lanvers.

translation.en: - I can't. - And I can't go home. Come on.
translation.fr:
- Je ne peux pas.
- Je ne peux pas rentrer chez moi !

translation.en: - A crackdown at home.
translation.fr: Ma mère veut que je révise.

translation.en: Gotta study 'cause summer's officially over.
translation.fr: Ma mère veut que je révise. L'été est terminé, il paraît.

translation.en: All that shit.
- You call the po-po on me?
- I'll text you later, B, okay?
- It's been a while since you texted me for a rescue.
translation.fr: Comme promis, je viens te sauver.

translation.en: - Yeah, well, you always say I'm full of surprises.
translation.fr: Oui, c'est ça. N'en fais pas une habitude.

translation.en: [door clicks shut] - It's me.
Your darling daughter?
Love of your life? Light of your loins?
translation.fr: le rayon de soleil de ta vie.

translation.en: - Chris Brown won't quit you, huh?
- Ain't no party like a Pops Slocum party.
translation.fr: Je ne voudrais pas rater ta teuf. Mercredi, c'est presque le week-end.

translation.en: - Hey, it's Wednesday night. Practically the weekend.
- Your dad knows you're here, Michael?
translation.fr: Ton père sait que tu es là ?

translation.en: - Yes, ma'am.
- Beats her usual partner in crime.
translation.fr: Je le préfère à ta grande amie.

translation.en: - Everybody hating on a white girl tonight.
translation.fr: Décidément, vous vous acharnez sur elle !

translation.en: - Hey, you were the one who pled rescue.
translation.fr: C'est toi qui m'a appelée à l'aide.

translation.en: - The new coach worked us really hard today.
translation.fr: La nouvelle coach nous a fait suer.

translation.en: - Sounds like my kind of coach.
- Yeah, she took two squads to the Illinois State cheer tournament.
translation.fr:
Ses précédentes équipes
sont montées en national.

translation.en: If we make it to state this year...
if we win...
- You always dream big.
Remember when you were little and you wanted to join the WNBA?
translation.fr:
Petite, tu voulais faire partie
de la WNBA.

translation.en: Mm-hmm, hanging on monkey bars for hours, trying to make yourself taller?
translation.fr:
Tu te pendais à l'échelle horizontale
pour grandir.

translation.en: - You don't get it.
Kentucky, OSU, Hawaii-- cheer scholarships are real.
translation.fr:
Il existe des bourses universitaires
de cheerleading.

translation.en: - Oh, like football scholarships?
Yeah, I remember your dad at your age.
translation.fr: Ton père disait la même chose.

translation.en: "Baby, this arm is our ticket out of Sutton Grove.
translation.fr:
Il était persuadé
qu'il obtiendrait une bourse.

translation.en: By this time next year, we'll be clubbing in Miami."
translation.fr: Il se voyait déjà à Miami.

translation.en: And we both know how that turned out.
translation.fr: On sait comment ça s'est fini.

translation.en: Dinner in 20.
- She thinks if I make it into City freaking Tech, then I'm set for life.
translation.fr:
Elle pense que mon seul espoir,
c'est City Tech.

translation.en: - My pops thinks I can make assistant manager at Sonic someday.
translation.fr:
Mon père me voit déjà
manager d'un fast-food.

translation.en: - I just don't know why we can't go someplace real.
translation.fr:
Je peux bien intégrer
une université  cotée.

translation.en: People do it.
- Yeah, certain people. People born on third base.
translation.fr: Si tu étais riche comme Crésus, peut-être.

translation.en: - No. It can happen.
If you work hard enough,
translation.fr: Il suffit que je travaille dur.

translation.en: you get strong. You rise.
translation.fr: On ne gagne que ce qu'on mérite.

translation.en: - Three, four. - Five, six, seven, eight.
translation.fr: Trois, quatre, cinq, six, sept, huit.

translation.en: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight...
translation.fr: Un, deux, trois, quatre, cinq, six, sept.

translation.en: One, two, three, four, five.
- Let's see your pyramid.
- Three, four, five, six, seven, eight...
translation.fr: Trois, quatre, cinq, six, sept, huit.

translation.en: - One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight.
translation.fr:
Un, deux, trois, quatre,
cinq, six, sept, huit.

translation.en: - Coming down.
Let's shake things up. Freshman, you're up.
translation.fr: On va changer un peu. Vas-y, gamine.

translation.en: - Her? The JV bottom-feeder?
translation.fr: Tu veux faire monter cette mioche ?

translation.en: She's five feet of hair.
translation.fr: Avec sa choucroute sur la tête.

translation.en: - Five feet of hair, get up there.
- I-- - You got this.
Don't you wanna make their jaws drop? It could be you on game day.
translation.fr: Tu dois être prête pour le grand jour.

translation.en: Three, four, five, six, seven, eight.
translation.fr: Trois, quatre, cinq, six, sept, huit.

translation.en: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight.
translation.fr:
Un, deux, trois, quatre,
cinq, six, sept, huit.

translation.en: - [grunts] - N--look out.
Lock out. Lock out your knees.
- No. Tighten up.
- Okay. You're okay.
All right. Come on. Stand up.
- Shake it off.
Good.
Okay, let's go over the choreography.
Come on.
Can I talk to you for a minute?
- Sure. [mints rattle]
I was, uh, here three days before I realized it wasn't plugged in.
translation.fr:
J'ai mis trois jour à me rendre compte
que ce n'était pas branché.

translation.en: - Yeah. Coach Melvoy's screwup. The gift that keeps on giving.
translation.fr:
Un petit cadeau de Melvoy
qu'elle refile à tout le monde.

translation.en: [chuckles] Like herpes.
Beth says that.
- But you're not Beth.
- That's what I came to talk to you about.
[inhales] Beth.
Look, you want to be careful with her.
translation.fr: Tu devrais faire attention, avec elle.

translation.en: - Go easy on her? Give her special treatment?
translation.fr:
Tu veux que je lui fasse
un traitement de faveur ?

translation.en: - No, that's not what I mean.
Beth's dad--you know, Mr. Cassidy?
He's a big dog here.
- Yeah, I got that.
- He's not a great dad, and Tacy...
translation.fr: Elle ne s'entend pas bien avec lui. Ni avec Tacy.

translation.en: - Sisters never get along.
- Half sisters.
Tacy's mom is Mr. Cassidy's sidepiece.
translation.fr: La mère de Tacy était l'amante de Cassidy.

translation.en: Lives right across the street.
Still does, except now, Beth's dad lives there too.
translation.fr:
Et maintenant,
le père de Beth vit avec elle.

translation.en: Small towns can be fucked up.
Look, I get that she's your friend.
translation.fr: Je sais que c'est ton amie.

translation.en: - She is.
- I've known a lot of Beths. She needs limits. I'm giving them to her. It's that simple.
translation.fr:
Mais les filles comme elles
ont besoin qu'on leur fixe des limites.

translation.en: I gotta go.
- Date night with Mr. Coach?
translation.fr: Tu te fais belle pour M. French ?

translation.en: - [chuckling] Yeah.
He likes to show me off.
Thanks.
- You got no gag reflex.
- That's not what her boyfriend says.
- I think she lives on Fairview.
translation.fr: Elle habite sur Fairview, je crois.

translation.en: - She's probably not even home.
translation.fr: Qui te dit qu'elle est chez elle ?

translation.en: - I'm telling you, there's something off about her.
translation.fr:
Crois-moi, elle n'est pas nette,
cette fille.

translation.en: - You're just pissed because she let Tacy be top girl today.
translation.fr: Tu es vexée qu'elle ait choisit Tacy.

translation.en: But screw it.
You'll be back on top on Friday.
- What?
- You should just be on my side.
- We all wanted a real coach.
A winning coach. Remember?
- If she's such hot shit, why'd she move back here?
translation.fr:
Si elle est si célèbre,
qu'est-ce qu'elle fait ici ?

translation.en: She only grew up, like, two towns over,
translation.fr: Elle a grandi tout près d'ici,

translation.en: in that armpit Sterling Heights, where we bought beer in junior high.
translation.fr:
dans le bled où on allait
acheter des bières au collège.

translation.en: - I know. - How do you know?
translation.fr:
- Je sais.
- Comment tu le sais ?

translation.en: - Anyone can Google.
♪ I'm moving fast... ♪ - This must be it. - ♪ I cannot answer ♪
- And you said she wouldn't be home.
- That's the husband?
He looks like a youth pastor.
God, I wouldn't fuck him.
- He'll be heartbroken.
♪ Little cat, you is a... ♪ - Come on. Let's just go. This is crazy.
- Why you got such a hard-on for her?
translation.fr:
- Tu la kiffes, ou quoi ?
- Non.

translation.en: - I don't. - I can see it from here.
translation.fr:
- Tu la kiffes, ou quoi ?
- Non. Ben voyons.

translation.en: It's a rando flasher hard-on.
translation.fr: Tu mouilles dès que tu la vois.

translation.en: - Wait, do you wanna fuck her? - What? No!
translation.fr:
- Tu veux te la taper ?
- Bien sûr que non !

translation.en: [stammers] - You wanna fuck her. Coach! - Stop!
translation.fr:
- Tu veux te la taper. Coach !
- Arrête !

translation.en: - Someone out here wants to fuck you! - Shh! Shut up!
translation.fr:
- Il y a quelqu'un qui veut te baiser !
- Arrête !

translation.en: Shut up!
- Go! Drive! Beth!
- [sighs] Is the peanut gallery still out there?
I'm telling you, these girls are nothing but boxed wine and attitude.
translation.fr:
Elles ne pensent qu'à frimer
et boire du vin en cubi.

translation.en: - Huh. That reminds me of somebody I used to know.
- Do I look like a boxed wine girl to you?
translation.fr: Le vin en cubi n'a jamais été mon truc.

translation.en: - Mm, nah, I bet you were more of a Mad Dog type.
translation.fr: Tu préférais la bière en canette ?

translation.en: - Hey, you'll whip them into shape.
I was gonna give you these after the game,
translation.fr: Je voulais te le donner après le match,

translation.en: but I thought maybe you'd wanna wear them to the party.
translation.fr:
mais comme ça,
tu pourras les porter à la soirée.

translation.en: - Matt.
Jesus.
- What'd your mom always say? "Every lady ought to"...
translation.fr: Ta mère disait que toute femme mérite…

translation.en: - [chuckles] ..."have a pair of red shoes like Dorothy."
Matt, we need to budget.
- It's not what we can afford. It's what you deserve.
translation.fr: Peu importe leur prix, tu les mérites.

translation.en: - Look, I know we moved here for me-- for--for this job--
translation.fr: Tu m'as suivi ici pour moi et mon travail…

translation.en: - It was for both of us.
- Yeah, but come on. You're the one--you're the one back where you started.
translation.fr:
Certes, mais pour toi,
c'est un pas en arrière.

translation.en: It-- - It's just for now. We're gonna make it work together.
translation.fr:
C'est temporaire.
On va y arriver. Ensemble.

translation.en: - No "I" in team, Coach? - [groans]
Look, I just want you to know that I haven't forgotten all the promises I made you, okay?
translation.fr:
Je n'ai pas oublié
toutes les promesses que je t'ai faites.

translation.en: - Hey, gorgeous. My lucky day.
translation.fr:
Bonjour, ma chère !
C'est mon jour de chance.

translation.en: Ah, I'm J.J. Curtis, RiRi's mom.
translation.fr: Je suis JJ Curtis, la mère de RiRi.

translation.en: - Hey. Colette French.
- We are so happy to have you here leading our girls.
translation.fr:
Nous sommes ravis
que vous entraîniez l'équipe.

translation.en: I--I don't know how Bert pulled it off.
- Yeah, we've got a ways to go. The girls are-- - Lazy.
translation.fr:
- On a du travail. Les filles sont…
- Paresseuses ?

translation.en: Raised on Ritalin and free porn.
translation.fr: Accros à la drogue et au porno ?

translation.en: Uh, so, uh, the squad boosters.
translation.fr:
Je fais partie
du comité de promotion de la ville.

translation.en: We have these brunches, and I would love to host one for you.
translation.fr:
Nous voulions organiser
un brunch en votre honneur.

translation.en: - Thanks. Uh, maybe once we get settled--
- RiRi is crazy about you.
How about Sunday?
Real casual-- day drinking, telling dirty jokes.
translation.fr:
Quelque chose de simple,
histoire de s'amuser.

translation.en: - Sorry. Maybe in a few weeks, when--
- Come on. Just the girls. - I can't.
translation.fr:
- Ce sera juste entre filles.
- Je ne peux pas.

translation.en: [stammers] I'm really focused on the game, and it's coming up fast.
translation.fr: Je dois me concentrer sur le match.

translation.en: And that's what you wanted me here for, right?
- Of course. [laughs]
- Okay. Head up. No sloppy stuff.
Again. Trust yourself. - [exhales]
- Better.
- Did you go there?
- Yeah.
- I'm thinking of places to apply.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas où postuler.

translation.en: Maybe more places than I thought.
translation.fr: Il y a tellement de choix.

translation.en: - You should. Do your research.
- I just wanna go, you know?
- Hanlon, it's important to have an exit plan that's more than just an exit.
translation.fr:
Hanlon, il faut que ce soit
une université qui te plaise.

translation.en: - Open it.
Open.
- Good.
- It shut down when I was a kid. - Tires, right?
translation.fr:
- Ça a fermé il y a longtemps.
- C'était une usine de pneus ?

translation.en: - I used to hear the chug-chug all day long, and one day, it just stopped.
translation.fr:
Du jour au lendemain,
on a plus entendu de bruit.

translation.en: The stadium they were building for the football team, that stopped too.
translation.fr:
La construction du stade
de football américain s'est arrêtée aussi.

translation.en: Everything just stopped.
- Reminds me of Roman ruins.
Hey, who's that, um...
that cute cross-country kid with the curly hair?
translation.fr:
ce mec super mignon
avec les cheveux bouclés ?

translation.en: - The one with the headphones? - Yeah.
[chuckling] Yeah. - Jordy Jones?
[laughs] He's nobody.
- Nobody won't distract you.
translation.fr: Tu ne laisses personne te distraire.

translation.en: Nobody'll make you feel good.
- So how did you end up here?
I mean, you could be anywhere. You could run squads anywhere.
translation.fr:
Tu pourrais entraîner
n'importe quelle autre équipe…

translation.en: - I wanna be here.
My husband, Matt, he has a chance here.
translation.fr: Mon mari, Matt, a eu une offre ici.

translation.en: He hasn't had many chances-- not like he thought.
translation.fr: Cela ne lui arrive pas si souvent,

translation.en: And he's given me so many.
translation.fr: et il a beaucoup fait pour moi.

translation.en: I owed him.
It's grown-up bullshit, right? - No.
translation.fr:
- Ça doit te sembler idiot.
- Non.

translation.en: I mean, I don't know.
I don't know many married people, though-- I mean, that are still married.
translation.fr:
Je connais peu de couples mariés
qui n'aient pas encore divorcé.

translation.en: - Maybe you'll be smarter than I was, Hanlon.
translation.fr: J'espère que tu seras plus maline que moi.

translation.en: About all this.
Maybe you already are.
- Uh, that's me.
- You're not like the others.
translation.fr: Tu n'es pas comme les autres.

translation.en: But you know that, don't you?
translation.fr: Mais tu le sais, n'est-ce pas ?

translation.en: - [quietly] Yes.
- So that's the new coach?
The blonde lady that couldn't stop and introduce herself?
translation.fr: Elle pourrait au moins dire bonjour.

translation.en: Hey, I got the, uh, stuff you wanted.
translation.fr: J'ai trouvé ce que tu voulais.

translation.en: The flaxseed.
I went to three different stores. [chuckles]
- Oh, yeah. Thanks.
He's back. - Sarge Will.
translation.fr: Il est de retour. Le sergent Will.

translation.en: - Wonder what he did all summer. - I wonder who he did all summer.
translation.fr:
- Je me demande ce qu'il a fait, cet été.
- Et avec qui.

translation.en: - Listen, I'm gonna give you my card
translation.fr:
Tiens… - Voici ma carte avec mon numéro.
- Merci.

translation.en: with my personal cell phone on it.
translation.fr:
- Voici ma carte avec mon numéro.
- Merci.

translation.en: - Oh, RiRi.
Pathetic. - [scoffs]
Your turn.
- She took your bet?
- Well, it's no fun playing by yourself.
translation.fr: C'est nul, de jouer toute seule.

translation.en: Been doing that a lot lately.
translation.fr: Ça m'arrive souvent, en ce moment.

translation.en: - I just have important things to do.
Things I care about.
You coming to calc?
- Why?
- No. Like this.
[grunts] This.
- Mom. Mom!
- Hey, sweetie pie.
This isn't what you think. Your mom-- - We're not your family anymore.
translation.fr:
- Ce n'est pas ce que tu crois.
- On n'est plus ta famille.

translation.en: - Listen-- - Get out.
- Would you just listen... - Get out.
- To me for a second? Your mother--
translation.fr:
- Dégage !
- Écoute-moi, veux-tu ? - Ta mère…
- Retourne voir ta femme et ta fille.

translation.en: - Go home to your wife and your daughter!
translation.fr:
- Ta mère…
- Retourne voir ta femme et ta fille.

translation.en: Your other wife and daughter. Go! - Baby girl. Baby girl, just listen.
translation.fr:
- Va chez ton autre famille.
- Écoute-moi, ma chérie.

translation.en: I've never been able to say no to her.
translation.fr: Je ne peux rien lui refuser.

translation.en: - Fuck you.
- Remember when...
you turned six, and we all drove down to Stony Creek and had that cookout?
translation.fr:
Le jour de tes six ans,
quand on était allés faire un barbecue.

translation.en: You remember that, don't you?
- Sure.
- We all fell asleep after Funfetti cake,
translation.fr: On s'est endormis après le gâteaux.

translation.en: and I woke up to you saying, "Mom! Mom! The sky turned orange."
translation.fr:
Tu m'as réveillée en criant :
"Maman, le ciel est orange !"

translation.en: - I said it was beautiful. You said it was pollution.
translation.fr:
Je trouvais ça beau,
tu disais que c'était la pollution.

translation.en: - [laughs] And then Dad said, "That's not pollution, ladies. That's progress."
translation.fr:
Et papa a dit : "Ce n'est pas
la pollution, c'est le progrès."

translation.en: - I can't wait till I can get out of here.
translation.fr: Je hâte de me barrer d'ici.

translation.en: I can't wait. - You think it's gonna be easy.
translation.fr:
- Tellement hâte.
- Tu crois que ce sera facile ?

translation.en: You'll leave. You'll be free!
translation.fr: Tu penses que tu seras enfin libre !

translation.en: - I never thought anything would be easy.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas dit que ce serait facile.

translation.en: ♪ Get, get loud for me ♪ cheerleaders: Get hard! [clap] Get mean!
Go, Eagles!
Get down! Get hard! Get mean!
translation.fr: Plus vite ! Plus fort ! Plus tenace !

translation.en: Go, Eagles!
Get down! Get hard! Get mean!
translation.fr: Plus vite ! Plus fort ! Plus tenace !

translation.en: Go, Eagles! - This isn't good.
- She'll be here.
Touchdown! Touchdown! We want an Eagles touchdown! Touchdown!
- Hi, Dad! Dad!
- Fuck!
- Well, at least he gets up quick.
[chuckles] Gonna make a great Marine. announcer: And that's the half. Stay seated.
translation.fr:
- Il ferait un super Marine.
- Mi-temps. Restez assis.

translation.en: The halftime show is about to begin.
translation.fr: Le spectacle de la mi-temps va commencer.

translation.en: - All right, let's go. Let's do this. Huddle up.
Huddle up!
I'm gonna tell you a secret.
translation.fr: Je vais vous dire un secret.

translation.en: There is no one better than you.
You are the strongest, meanest,
translation.fr:
Vous êtes les plus fortes,
les plus tenaces,

translation.en: baddest women this town has ever seen,
translation.fr:
les plus intraitables
que cette ville ait connues.

translation.en: and you are about to show everyone what you are made of:
translation.fr: Ils vont voir ce qu'ils vont voir.

translation.en: the hard, hard gold that pounds in your chests.
translation.fr:
Montrer-leur de quel métal
vous êtes faites.

translation.en: You are royalty now. You're gods.
translation.fr: Vous êtes des reines. Des déesses.

translation.en: Make them bow down.
Do me proud.
- Mmkay. This is it.
Fast, tight, light. Just like in practice.
That means you. Tacy's top.
translation.fr: Surtout toi. Tacy est la voltigeuse.

translation.en: - You can't be serious.
You put her up there, she's gonna break her neck. I'm top girl.
translation.fr:
Elle va se briser la nuque.
C'est moi, la voltigeuse.

translation.en: - Top girl is a girl who shows, every practice, every game.
translation.fr: Une voltigeuse se doit d'être assidue.

translation.en: - I showed. I'm here.
- Top girl is a girl who can control herself.
- I'm the captain. - We're not doing captains anymore.
translation.fr:
- Je suis la capitaine.
- Plus maintenant.

translation.en: - No, I'm captain. This is my squad.
It's mine.
My squads don't have captains.
translation.fr: Pas de capitaine dans mon équipe.

translation.en: You got this.
Let's go.
crowd: [chanting] Eagles! Eagles! Eagles!
- What was I supposed to do?
translation.fr: Tu voulais que je fasse quoi ?

translation.en: Let her fall? It was Coach's choice.
translation.fr:
La laisser tomber ?
La coach voulait que ce soit elle.

translation.en: - You chose to be her little bitch.
translation.fr: Tu préfères lui lécher le cul.

translation.en: - A diamond in a rhinestone world.
translation.fr: Un diamant au milieu de la pacotille.

translation.en: Coach. - Wow. We pulled it off.
- Oh, more than that.
I was talking to the regionals organizers. They're interested in letting us host.
translation.fr:
On va peut-être pouvoir accueillir
les championnats régionaux.

translation.en: - Mm. That'd be great. First round bye.
- Hell yes. Look what you did in just one week.
translation.fr:
C'est grâce à vous.
En à peine une semaine !

translation.en: We're back on the map again.
They'll stop thinking of us as a Rust Belt backwater once they get an eyeful of that stadium plan.
translation.fr:
Quand les organisateurs auront vu
les plans du stade, ils seront bluffés.

translation.en: And we intend to get you everything you need to lay hands on those tournament rings.
translation.fr:
S'il le faut,
on ira s'emparer du trophée par la force.

translation.en: - [laughs] What he really means is that we're hitching all our wagons to your star, Coach French.
translation.fr:
Ce qu'il veut dire, c'est que
tout la ville compte sur vous.

translation.en: - No pressure.
Pressure's how diamonds get made.
translation.fr: Un diamant se forme par pression.

translation.en: - All right, all right, Sutton Grove! - Ow!
- Thank you guys. [applause]
So listen. Our football team, huh?
translation.fr:
Ce soir, les gars
de notre équipe de football

translation.en: Got the shit kicked out of them tonight...
translation.fr: se sont pris une sacrée raclée !

translation.en: Jeez. Again.
[laughs] How times have changed. When a lot of us went to school here,
translation.fr:
Les temps ont bien changé.
Quand on était au lycée,

translation.en: everything was football, right? We thought it would be that way forever.
translation.fr:
tout le monde ne parlait que
de foot américain.

translation.en: We even had a plan to build a big, gleaming new stadium for our boys.
translation.fr:
On avait même commencé à construire
un magnifique stade pour notre équipe.

translation.en: We had to put that dream on hold. We were struggling.
translation.fr:
On a dû mettre ce projet entre parenthèses
à cause de difficultés.

translation.en: All right? Like so many American towns...
felt left behind. But no more.
Tonight, friends--tonight, we witnessed a transformation.
translation.fr:
Ce soir, nous avons assisté
à une véritable transformation.

translation.en: We saw how good our girls could be.
translation.fr:
Nous avons vu de quoi
étaient capables les filles !

translation.en: We saw that they could take the lead.
translation.fr: Ce sont elles qui nous mèneront loin !

translation.en: These girls right here. [cheers and applause]
Who run the world?
Who run the--girls!
G--girls. You've seen the T-shirt. Come on, you guys. [laughs]
Leaving me hanging up here. Now, listen.
Some people say cheer is not a sport.
translation.fr:
D'aucuns disent que le cheerleading
n'est pas un sport.

translation.en: I think Coach French over here would disagree,
translation.fr:
Notre coach
peut vous assurer le contraire.

translation.en: but I can tell you this:
it is a business.
It's an industry. It's the future.
And it is a future that is coming here to Sutton Grove.
translation.fr:
Et c'est cet avenir
qui s'offre à nous, à Sutton Grove.

translation.en: Let's hear it! Come on! [cheers and applause]
translation.fr: Je ne vous entends pas ! Plus fort !

translation.en: Folks, a stadium can transform a town.
translation.fr:
Mes amis,
un stade peut transformer une ville.

translation.en: A stadium can heal a town.
If we build this, they will come!
translation.fr:
La construction de ce stade,
c'est notre salut !

translation.en: When we have this stadium-- when we have this stadium,
translation.fr: Quand ce stade sera construit, quand ce symbole sera construit,

translation.en: this beacon, this lodestar,
translation.fr:
quand ce symbole sera construit, quand nous aurons cet emblème,
plus rien ne pourra nous arrêter.

translation.en: there is nothing we can't do.
translation.fr:
quand nous aurons cet emblème,
plus rien ne pourra nous arrêter.

translation.en: Sutton Grove begins again!
translation.fr: Sutton Grove renaîtra de ses cendres !

translation.en: ♪ Like a mechanical bull ♪ - Wait.
Him. - ♪ Then you'll be sorry... ♪
- Him? Why?
- ♪ Like a mechanical bull ♪ - Why not?
- Hey! Jordy Jones!
- ♪ You've been at my throat ♪ - Get in!
It's your lucky day.
♪ You've been at my throat ♪ - You better have weed.
- Hey! Jailbait! Is that my phone?
- Hey. Soldier boy.
What else you got in that car?
translation.fr: Tu as quoi, dans ta caisse ?

translation.en: - Seriously?
The head push? You're pulling that shit on me?
- I just--I-- I don't know what you want.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas ce que tu veux.

translation.en: Just...
Make me feel good...
Jordy Jones.
Make me feel...
- You must be Matt. [laughs]
- Yeah. - I'm J.J. Hi.
Welcome to our nest of vipers. [laughs]
translation.fr: Bienvenue dans notre nid de vipères. Avec Bert, vous devez avoir l'habitude.

translation.en: But you're probably used to that, working for Bert.
translation.fr: Avec Bert, vous devez avoir l'habitude.

translation.en: - Um, no--no bites yet. - [laughs] - But I just started.
translation.fr:
On ne m'a pas encore mordu.
Pour l'instant !

translation.en: I'm the project manager for the new stadium.
translation.fr: Je suis le chef du projet pour le stade.

translation.en: - I know. I know.
What I don't know is which one of you he had his eyes on first.
translation.fr:
Je me demande
sur qui il a mis le grappin en premier.

translation.en: - Well, he's had his sights trained on your wife
translation.fr:
- Pardon ?
- Il court après votre femme

translation.en: since she took Jeff East to state.
We just never thought we could land her.
Never say Bert Cassidy doesn't know how to sweeten a deal.
translation.fr: Il faut croire que Cassidy a su négocier.

translation.en: - Oh, there he is. - Hey.
translation.fr: Le voilà. Ce n'est pas trop tôt ! Venez par ici.

translation.en: - Oh, had to make a grand entrance, huh?
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas trop tôt ! Venez par ici.

translation.en: - Guess I missed a lot. - Hey.
- How was, uh-- how was the game?
- Oh, not bad.
Uh, Mr. Cassidy has two daughters on the squad-- - The little one stole the show.
translation.fr:
- M. Cassidy a deux filles dans l'équipe.
- La petite a assuré.

translation.en: People always say to me, "Bert, I bet you wish you had sons."
translation.fr:
Les gens pensent
que j'aurais préféré des fils.

translation.en: You know what I say to them? "Fuck that old news."
[laughs] I mean, right? Look at my girls.
Energy, swagger, balls.
- Yes, well, getting any of them to actually work is the hard part.
translation.fr: Quand elles veulent bien s'y mettre.

translation.en: - All right, that's the-- [laughs]
- It took me a while too. Matt helped me with that.
translation.fr: Ça m'a pris du temps, moi aussi. Matt m'a beaucoup aidée.

translation.en: I don't know where I would be without him.
translation.fr: J'ignore où j'en serais sans lui.

translation.en: - Exactly where you are.
[laughs] Hell, don't be modest.
I didn't realize you followed Colette's career so closely.
translation.fr:
J'ignorais que la carrière de Colette
vous intéressait tant.

translation.en: - Oh, I follow winners.
translation.fr:
J'ignorais que la carrière de Colette
vous intéressait tant. C'est normal, c'est une gagnante.

translation.en: And then I buy them.
We've had this date together from the beginning-- all three of us.
translation.fr:
C'était une affaire entre nous trois,
depuis le début.

translation.en: You look great. It's good to see you.
translation.fr: Ça fait plaisir de vous voir.

translation.en: I'm glad you could--Bill. - Thanks. - Come over here. I wanted to--
- What the hell, B?
- [giggles] - Beth.
Put the fucking gun down.
- Listen to your friend.
- What friend?
I had a friend.
Not anymore.
- Beth. Look at me.
- She was my girl.
She was the only one. And she's gone.
translation.fr:
Elle était tout, pour moi.
Mais plus maintenant.

translation.en: - Put the fucking gun down.
Beth, come on.
- Everything's bad.
You can't fight it.
- Let's just go, okay? You and me.
translation.fr: Allons-y, d'accord ? Juste toi et moi.

translation.en: Let's go down to the factory and break some windows and go crazy.
translation.fr:
On n'a qu'à aller à l'usine désaffectée
pour faire des conneries.

translation.en: You and me.
Put the fucking gun down.
You and me.
- Yeah. - Just you and me. Like the old days.
translation.fr: Toutes les deux, comme à l'époque.

translation.en: Please?
- She gonna get into trouble with your coach?
translation.fr: Elle va avoir des ennuis avec la coach ?

translation.en: - No.
No one's gonna say anything. I won't let them.
translation.fr: Je ferai en sorte que ça ne se sache pas.

translation.en: - Well, she's lucky to have you.
translation.fr: Elle a de la chance de t'avoir.

translation.en: Our coach...
had eyes in the back of his head.
translation.fr: avait des yeux derrière les têtes.

translation.en: - You played? - Hundred years ago.
translation.fr:
- Vous avez joué ?
- Il y a longtemps.

translation.en: Over in Allanville.
Best time of my life.
Goes by quick, though.
And you never get it back.
translation.fr: On ne revient pas en arrière.

translation.en: I was gonna tell you.
- It turns out you were right.
About the shoes, I mean.
We can't afford them.
- Everything's changing.
translation.fr: Tout est en train de changer.

translation.en: You're changing.
- No, I'm not.
- Addy, you're a good person.
translation.fr: Addy, tu es une fille bien.

translation.en: You don't know how it works.
People like that, they throw you away.
translation.fr: Méfie-toi de ce genre de personnes.

translation.en: - People like what?
Go to sleep.
Everything's okay.
- ♪ I hope that our memories stay ♪
- You're still my girl, right, Addy?
- Yeah.
- What?
- My phone.
I must have left it up at Lanvers.
- Coach told me something once.
translation.fr: Ma coach m'a dit quelque chose…

translation.en: She said,
"Someday, you're gonna really want something."
translation.fr: "Quand tu sauras ce que tu veux,

translation.en: "That's when you'll find out who you are."
translation.fr: tu sauras qui tu es vraiment."

translation.en: - Oh. Got it.
- But there's a price for everything.
You have to give up the old things...
the things that feel easy,
the things that feel safe.
This is how you become strong.
translation.fr: C'est comme ça qu'on devient fort.

translation.en: This is how you become a woman.
Beth!
We're not saying anything.
translation.fr: On ne dira rien à personne !

translation.en: We're not saying--
- [laughing] - We're not saying-- Beth!
In the end...
I couldn't stop it.
translation.fr: je n'ai rien pu faire pour empêcher

translation.en: Any of it.
